citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:16 pm on
11/17/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling phone number on file, and
calling licensee at work. Spoke with licensee and he was unable to leave work to facilitate an inspection. Spoke with the
licensee's spouse who was unavailable to accompany APHIS Officials for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:16 pm on 
11/17/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling phone number on file, and 
calling licensee at work. Spoke with licensee and he was unable to leave work to facilitate an inspection. Spoke with the 
licensee's spouse who was unavailable to accompany APHIS Officials for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
